ModMetaData.name: Momu
ModMetaData.author: Rekasa
ModMetaData.description:
Friendly, communal and vegan bunny people! Thanks to Goob and Serpy (art) and Ogliss, Miko and balistafreak for C# among other things! 

 Beta version, please contact Rekasa#0001 on discord with bugs! 

 Required mods: Hugslib, Humanoid Alien Races 2.0, KV Show Hair With Hats
